mapper.select: select * from family_history_form where card_id = #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by family_history_id desc
select top 1 * from family_history_form order by family_history_id desc
mapper.insert: insert into family_history_form (family_history_id, card_id, relation, illness_name, describe) values (#{familyHistoryId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cardId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{illnessName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

card_id,
relation,
illness_name,
describe,
